document_data.name: Thaundyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaundyl''' was a member of the [[Risen Cult of Bane]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|29-30}}<ref group="note" name="Year">[[Dragon magazine 362|''Dragon'' #362]] provides an exact date for the events of ''[[Halls of the High King]]'', which did not give an exact date within itself.
document_data.Abilities: Thaundyl was capable of casting the [[spell]]s  ''[[blindness]]'', ''[[dispel magic]]'', ''[[fireball]]'', ''[[invisibility]]'', ''[[magic missile]]'', ''[[spider climb]]'', ''[[wall of fire]]'', and ''[[web]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Like his fellow wizards at the time, Thaundyl possessed a set of [[robe]]s, two [[dagger]]s laced in [[Sleeping poison|sleep poison]], and a ''[[ring of protection]] +4''.
document_data.History: In [[1359 DR]],<ref group="note" name="Year" /> Thaundyl was sent by the High Hands of the Risen Cult of Bane to kidnap High King [[Tristan Kendrick]]. He was accompanied by his fellow [[wizard]]s, [[Rhammos]] and [[Zelgos]], as well as twelve [[priest]]s, fourteen [[orc]]s, and eight [[battle horror]]s. However, their plans were thwarted by a group of [[adventurer]]s and [[Harpers]].
